Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1016.jpg'}
{3: "The afternoon sun's softer than you'd expect, probably because of the clouds. You can even look straight up without hurting your eyes."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleHuaban.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'You relax completely and lie back on the grass. Petals float all around you, carried by the breeze.'}
{3: 'The flower petals suddenly swirl, like someone has just walked by, stirring up the air.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleHuaban.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: "A red figure looms into view. Luna's standing next to you, arms crossed, looking down at you."}
{3: 'Just like the prophetic vision you had while drinking coffee back at camp, Luna is indeed close by.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "You don't seem surprised I'm here. Did you know I was coming?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just a hunch.', 3: '19', 4: "Would you believe I dreamt you'd be here?", 5: '19'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Hmm, doesn't matter. Saves me from having to look for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Looking for me?', 3: '21', 4: 'What is it?', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Hmph, asking useless questions.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She opens her hand, letting the pendant hang from its silver chain.'}
{3: 'You stand and take it—a moon-shaped pendant with a rotating center that shows different moon phases.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "There's a clasp on the back.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After what Luna said, you flip the pendant and find a tiny switch on the chain. It blends in perfectly, you can barely see it.'}
{2: 'Quite beautiful.', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I wasn't asking for a design review. I was trying to get you to...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Alright, give it here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna leans in, takes the pendant, and opens the clasp.'}
{3: 'She moves closer to you.'}
{3: "You fight the urge to flinch as Luna brings the pendant close, her other hand reaching behind your neck for the chain's end."}
{3: 'She carefully puts the chain around your neck and fastens the clasp.'}
{3: 'She looks at the pendant on your chest for a few seconds, then turns it, changing the moon from a crescent to a full moon. She looks at it again, a small smile of satisfaction on her face.'}
{3: "Luna looks up, like she's asking what you think. Then, when your eyes meet, she realizes she's a bit too close."}
{3: 'She steps back, keeping a straight face, to give you some space. For a second, her eyes almost look away, but then she looks right back at you.'}
{2: 'You mean this?', 3: '50', 4: 'You look beautiful.', 5: '53'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'What else could I be talking about?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stops, like she just realized something, and puts her hand up to stop you.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Never mind. You don't have to answer. Forget I asked.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "That's good to hear.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Your eyes drift away, and neither of you says anything. A brief silence hangs between you. Like she can't take the quiet, Luna clears her throat and looks back at you."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "What were you looking at up there? I tried to see what you were looking at, but I couldn't find anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just looking up.', 3: '57'}
{2: "Sometimes it's nice to just look up at the sky and switch off. It's... relaxing.", 3: '58'}
{2: 'Want to come with me?', 3: '59'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "That's already boring me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even after saying that, Luna sits down on the grass next to you.'}
{3: 'When she crouches and touches the grass and dirt, she hesitates.'}
{3: "You see why Luna's hesitating and look around, but you don't have a blanket or anything to sit on."}
{3: "You turn to Luna after hearing her and see she's checking out your jacket."}
{2: "If it's okay with you...", 3: '68'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Give it to me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As if to stay clean, Luna lies on her side on your jacket.'}
{2: 'Can you see the sky from there?', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I'm way past looking at the sky. How about we look at something different...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking at you, she pauses, then says.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'You get a great view of the moon from here at night.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "We've still got a bit before it gets dark...", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't have anything else planned.", 3: '77'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Actually, me too.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her hand brushes the jacket lining, still warm from your body.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Then let's stay here a bit longer.", 4: '1'}
